meta.service_agency_name: Office of the Secretary Of Defense

ServiceAgencyName.val: Office of the Secretary Of Defense

ProjectMissionDescription.val: This program focuses on continued development of domestic technologies to support the assessment of foreign technologies that have demonstrated potential.  In coordination with an international partner, unique and innovative approaches are used to expand the performance envelopes.  This program supports military requirements identified in Joint Vision 2020, the Defense Science and Technology Strategy, the Anti-Submarine Warfare (ASW) Initial Capabilities Document and the Fleet ASW Integrated Prioritized Capability List.

Text.val: Provided Mission Support (Details provided in Defense-Wide classified book).
Will provide Mission Support (Details provided in Defense-Wide classified book).
Continue to provide Mission Support (Details provided in Defense-Wide classified book).

AcquisitionStrategy.val: Details provided in Defense-Wide classified book.

PerformanceMetrics.val: Numbers of operational field demonstrations; actual/in-kind resource sharing differential among participating entities; studies produced; successful anomaly detections; false-positive results; and technology transfers.

EventTitle.val: Continue Joint Oversight Committee Review (3rd Quarter each year)
Continue ASAP Web-Based Information (4th Quarter each year)
